nodes.text: Hanera's Dance Troupe was an entertainment company in the Old Galactic Market on Coruscant during the Cold War. Around 3643 BBY, the Troupe was based out of the headquarters of the Migrant Merchants' Guild, a criminal syndicate comprised of alien refugees. During this time, Hanera's Dance Troupe employed many erotic dancers, primarily female Twi'leks, although one Nautolan, Ria Deleru, did elect to join the Troupe.
